price: Kõwane rai mai ɗanɗanar mutuwa ne. Kuma Munã jarraba ku da sharri da alhẽri dõmin fitina. Kuma zuwa gare Mu ake mayar da ku.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۗ وَنَبۡلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلۡخَيۡرِ فِتۡنَةٗۖ وَإِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti wanablūkum bil-shari wal-khayri fit'natan wa-ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
